name: Missing Milu!
description:
You're looking for your best friend. Put up pamphlets on different spots to get more chances of finding your dog. Good luck!

Game made for Global Game Jam 2021.

Bruna Gonçalves: Game Designer - Twitter:  https://twitter.com/brunadsg_   

Érica Andreina: 2D Artist- Twitter: https://twitter.com/araviaandreina

Rui Humberto: Game Developer - Twitter: https://twitter.com/Rumberto_
